display_long_description:
Designed for casual fans and aspiring pros alike, Tennis League VR delivers the thrill of intense rallies and the triumph of landing the perfect ace. Use real tennis techniques to dominate the leaderboards and smash the competition! Play solo or online across a variety of game modes.

Download the Tennis League VR Free Edition and join over 80,000 players who have already lobbed, sliced, and drop-shotted their way to match point. Experience the most precise tennis physics outside of the real court! Refine your swing with exercises, challenges, and more.

# Full game features

🎾 **Become a VR Tennis Ace**

Jump into Career Mode and compete in tournaments against challenging AI opponents on a variety of courts.

🎾 **Training Lessons**

Learn the basics of groundstrokes, volleys, and serves in the robust Training Mode, featuring customizable ball cannon practice options and engaging skill challenges.

🎾 **Droid Rush Mode**

Perfect your swing against a swarm of robot invaders in Droid Rush. Hone your aim and take down their shields quickly!

🎾**Cross-Play Online Multiplayer**

Test your skills against players from around the world, regardless of their headset. Invite up to 8 friends to spectate from the sidelines.

🎾 **Multiple Control Options**

Move around the court using teleportation or analog stick movement, and customize your playstyle to suit your preferences!
